## Android applications from University and Home Made

# NIT6120 - Mobile Applications Victoria University (Semester 1 2020)

1. Martial Arts Grading Application 

This application is a multi screen application to store grading scores
for Martial Arts, using a single level belt as an example.
The application uses functionality of Android Programming including
SQL, Data Storage on the App, Data Manipulation Functionality, Intents,
moving .gif displays and Password Entry
